CONSOLE MESSAGE: line 24: *** Error compiling shader '[object WebGLShader]':ERROR: 0:124: 'foo' : syntax error 

shader with line directive returns error at proper line

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".

test: vertex shader uses #line directive should report correct line
test vertex shader
default fragment shaderPASS vertex shader uses #line directive should report correct line

PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
